Class ClasspathScanningSupport

java.lang.Object
org.junit.platform.engine.support.filter.ClasspathScanningSupport
@Deprecated @API(status=DEPRECATED, since="1.5") public final class ClasspathScanningSupport extends Object
Deprecated.
Please use EngineDiscoveryRequestResolver instead.

    • buildClassFilter

      @Deprecated public static ClassFilter buildClassFilter(EngineDiscoveryRequest request, Predicate<Class<?>> classPredicate)
      Deprecated.
      Please use EngineDiscoveryRequestResolver instead.
      Build a ClassFilter by combining the name predicate built by buildClassNamePredicate(EngineDiscoveryRequest) and the passed-in class predicate.
      Parameters:
      request - the request to build a name predicate from
